${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
${modID}:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PenetratingStrike.NAME: Penetrating Strike
${modID}:PenetratingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

${modID}:Rejoinder.NAME: Rejoinder
${modID}:Rejoinder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Shank.NAME: Shank
${modID}:Shank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each of the enemy's debuffs.

${modID}:Conk.NAME: Conk
${modID}:Conk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has 2 or more Weak, stun them and remove all Weak. NL Otherwise, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:DefensiveLunge.NAME: Defensive Lunge
${modID}:DefensiveLunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
${modID}:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to a random enemy X times. NL Exhaust 1 card at random.
${modID}:Flurry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Weak to a random enemy X+1 times. NL Exhaust 1 card.

${modID}:ShieldBash.NAME: Shield Bash
${modID}:ShieldBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Modify all Skills in your hand with ${modID}:Reinforced. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CeremonialVibrokhopesh.NAME: Vibrokhopesh
${modID}:CeremonialVibrokhopesh.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce this card's cost by !M!.

${modID}:Dismember.NAME: Dismember
${modID}:Dismember.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HookAndDrag.NAME: Hook and Drag
${modID}:HookAndDrag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your next turn, the enemy loses !M! HP for each card drawn.

${modID}:ChromeRevolver.NAME: Chrome Revolver
${modID}:ChromeRevolver.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card.

${modID}:GrapplingGun.NAME: Grappling Gun
${modID}:GrapplingGun.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw !${modID}:draw! card.
${modID}:GrapplingGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw !${modID}:draw! cards.

${modID}:ChainPistol.NAME: Chain Pistol
${modID}:ChainPistol.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:BloodGradientHandVacuum.NAME: Blood-Gradient Vacuum
${modID}:BloodGradientHandVacuum.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PhaseCannon.NAME: Phase Cannon
${modID}:PhaseCannon.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each card drawn at the start of your turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:HighExplosiveGrenade.NAME: Explosive Grenade
${modID}:HighExplosiveGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PoisonGasGrenade.NAME: Poison Gas Grenade
${modID}:PoisonGasGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ResonanceGrenade.NAME: Resonance Grenade
${modID}:ResonanceGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, deal !M! damage and apply !${modID}:vuln! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:StunGasGrenade.NAME: Stun Gas Grenade
${modID}:StunGasGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, deal 5 damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:HandENuke.NAME: Hand-E-Nuke
${modID}:HandENuke.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, deal !M! damage to EVERYONE.

${modID}:FreezeGrenade.NAME: Freeze Grenade
${modID}:FreezeGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, gain !B! Block and deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:TimeDilationGrenade.NAME: Time Dilation Grenade
${modID}:TimeDilationGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:WillpowerUp.NAME: Willpower
${modID}:WillpowerUp.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, gain [E].

${modID}:EatersNectarInjector.NAME: Eater's Nectar Injector
${modID}:EatersNectarInjector.DESCRIPTION: Choose an attribute to increase. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Lose [E] NL Exhaust.
${modID}:EatersNectarInjector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an attribute to greatly increase. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Lose [E] NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HulkHoneyInjector.NAME: Hulk Honey Injector
${modID}:HulkHoneyInjector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL You cannot gain Block from cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Akimbo.NAME: Akimbo
${modID}:Akimbo.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a ${modID}:Gun each turn, draw !M! card.

${modID}:RubbergumInjector.NAME: Rubbergum Injector
${modID}:RubbergumInjector.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP this turn, gain !M! Block next turn. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Shuffle a *Slimed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SalveInjector.NAME: Salve Injector
${modID}:SalveInjector.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShadeOilInjector.NAME: Shade Oil Injector
${modID}:ShadeOilInjector.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Shuffle an *Evil *Twin into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SphynxSaltInjector.NAME: Sphynx Salt Injector
${modID}:SphynxSaltInjector.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. Draw !${modID}:draw! card. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Gain *Entangled NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SphynxSaltInjector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. Draw !${modID}:draw! cards. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Gain *Entangled NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RifleThroughTrash.NAME: Rifle Through Trash
${modID}:RifleThroughTrash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Put !M! random card from your exhaust pile into your hand. Increase this card’s cost by 1 this combat.
${modID}:RifleThroughTrash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Put !M! random cards from your exhaust pile into your hand. Increase this card’s cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Calloused.NAME: Calloused
${modID}:Calloused.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, decrease its Block by 1 this combat.

${modID}:IronBuckler.NAME: Iron Buckler
${modID}:IronBuckler.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

${modID}:Meditate.NAME: Meditate
${modID}:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Retain a card. NL End your turn.
${modID}:Meditate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Retain !${modID}:retain! cards. NL End your turn.

${modID}:FulleriteAegis.NAME: Fullerite Aegis
${modID}:FulleriteAegis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Modify a random card in your hand with ${modID}:Reinforced.
${modID}:FulleriteAegis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Modify !M! random cards in your hand with ${modID}:Reinforced.

${modID}:ForceBracelet.NAME: Force Bracelet
${modID}:ForceBracelet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Metallicize NL X times. NL When you end your turn with no [E] , lose 3 Metallicize.
${modID}:ForceBracelet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Metallicize NL X+1 times. NL When you end your turn with no [E] , lose 3 Metallicize.

${modID}:Juke.NAME: Juke
${modID}:Juke.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL ${modID}:Modify a random Attack in your hand with ${modID}:Sharp. NL ${modID}:Guns excluded.
${modID}:Juke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Modify !M! random Attacks in your hand with ${modID}:Sharp. NL ${modID}:Guns excluded.

${modID}:MagnetizedChassisPlate.NAME: Magnetized Chassis Plate
${modID}:MagnetizedChassisPlate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

${modID}:PointDefenseDrone.NAME: Point-Defense Drone
${modID}:PointDefenseDrone.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:VaamsLens.NAME: Va'am's Lens
${modID}:VaamsLens.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SolarCell.NAME: Solar Cell
${modID}:SolarCell.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !M! [E]. NL At the end of your turn, reduce this amount by 1.

${modID}:Disassemble.NAME: Disassemble
${modID}:Disassemble.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card to gain 6 Gold.
${modID}:Disassemble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Gain 6 Gold for each exhausted card.

${modID}:MetamorphicPolygel.NAME: Metamorphic Polygel
${modID}:MetamorphicPolygel.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MetamorphicPolygel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card. NL Add a copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DeftThrowing.NAME: Deft Throwing
${modID}:DeftThrowing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! temporary Dexterity for each active grenade.

${modID}:ZetachromeLune.NAME: Zetachrome Lune
${modID}:ZetachromeLune.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Metallicize. NL At the start of each turn, lose 1 Metallicize.

${modID}:FlumeFlier.NAME: Flume Flier
${modID}:FlumeFlier.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Flume *Dash into your hand.

${modID}:FlumeDash.NAME: Flume Dash
${modID}:FlumeDash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Burn into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ForceModulator.NAME: Force Modulator
${modID}:ForceModulator.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL Your first Attack each turn deals damage regardless of the enemy's block.

${modID}:InflatableAxons.NAME: Inflatable Axons
${modID}:InflatableAxons.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL On odd turns, draw 1 additional card. NL On even turns, draw 1 less card.

${modID}:StabilizerArmLocks.NAME: Stabilizer Arm Locks
${modID}:StabilizerArmLocks.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL ALL ${modID}:Gun cards deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:MedassistModule.NAME: Medassist Module
${modID}:MedassistModule.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL Your first played *Injector card each turn costs 0.

${modID}:ForceKnife.NAME: Force Knife
${modID}:ForceKnife.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Force *Knife to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PrecisionForceLathe.NAME: Precision Force Lathe
${modID}:PrecisionForceLathe.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Force *Knife+ to your hand.

${modID}:GiantHands.NAME: Giant Hands
${modID}:GiantHands.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random Attack in your hand by 1.

${modID}:MotorizedTreads.NAME: Motorized Treads
${modID}:MotorizedTreads.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL Draw 2 additional cards at the start of each turn. NL You cannot draw additional cards after.

${modID}:HolographicVisage.NAME: Holographic Visage
${modID}:HolographicVisage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL The next 2 times you end your turn without playing any Attacks, gain 1 Buffer.

${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTracery.NAME: Ruby Cathedra
${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTracery.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E]. NL Shuffle a *Pyrokinesis *Field into your draw pile.

${modID}:PyrokinesisField.NAME: Pyrokinesis Field
${modID}:PyrokinesisField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${modID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: *Modify 2 cards in your hand with random ${modID}:Mods. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SlingAndRun.NAME: Sling and Run
${modID}:SlingAndRun.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Sprint into your draw pile.
${modID}:SlingAndRun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Gun. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Sprint+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:Longstrider.NAME: Longstrider
${modID}:Longstrider.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Sprint into your draw pile.
${modID}:Longstrider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a *Sprint+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:Juicer.NAME: Juicer
${modID}:Juicer.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an injector, gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Whenever you trigger an ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:JackIn.NAME: Jack In
${modID}:JackIn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${modID}:Modify !M! cards in your hand with ${modID}:Jacked.

${modID}:BecomeNull.NAME: Become Null
${modID}:BecomeNull.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Modify up to X cards in your hand with ${modID}:Nulling. NL Shuffle a *Void into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BecomeNull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Modify up to X cards in your hand with ${modID}:Nulling. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SpreadShot.NAME: Spread Shot
${modID}:SpreadShot.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Modify a ${modID}:Gun card in your hand with ${modID}:Beamsplitter. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SpreadShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Modify !M! ${modID}:Gun cards in your hand with ${modID}:Beamsplitter. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SwiftReflexes.NAME: Swift Reflexes
${modID}:SwiftReflexes.DESCRIPTION: The first card you discard each turn is returned to your hand and ${modID}:Modified with ${modID}:Flexiweaved.
${modID}:SwiftReflexes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first card you discard each turn is returned to your hand and ${modID}:Modified with ${modID}:Flexiweaved.

${modID}:Grindstone.NAME: Grindstone
${modID}:Grindstone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Modify an Attack in your draw pile with ${modID}:Sharp. NL ${modID}:Guns excluded. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Grindstone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Modify !M! Attacks in your draw pile with ${modID}:Sharp. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EMPGrenade.NAME: EMP Grenade
${modID}:EMPGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your next turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Pulsed to ALL enemies.

${modID}:MagneticCore.NAME: Magnetic Core
${modID}:MagneticCore.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL Reduce the cost of Powers by 1. NL Whenever you play a Power, apply 1 ${modID}:Pulsed to a random enemy.

${modID}:EvilTwinStatus.NAME: Evil Twin
${modID}:EvilTwinStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, take !M! damage when Attacks are played.

${modID}:LoveInjector.NAME: Love Injector
${modID}:LoveInjector.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Lovesick. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL Add 2 *Burns into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SkulkInjector.NAME: Skulk Injector
${modID}:SkulkInjector.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Modify !M! random cards in your hand with ${modID}:Flexiweaved. NL ${modID}:Adverse *Reaction: NL You cannot see enemy intents for 2 turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Shocked.NAME: Shocked
${modID}:Shocked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card is drawn, draw !M! less card next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ReverseEngineer.NAME: Reverse Engineer
${modID}:ReverseEngineer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Tinker. NL Transform all cards in your hand into *Shocked. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BiodynamicPowerPlant.NAME: Biodynamic Power Plant
${modID}:BiodynamicPowerPlant.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cybernetic. NL Whenever you gain HP, gain [E] next turn.
